name: Vastaria
description:
Vastaria is a concept I've had in my head for a while, its a highly interactable rpg world with a focus on aesthetics and gameplay, Taking inspiration from things like Dungeons & Dragons and anime mmo's. 

This is just a proof of concept for Vastaria's general aesthetic. It was created as a part of my 1st year final project, however due to the events of 2020 limiting classroom activity I didn't manage to implement all the mechanics id wanted.

Id like to keep developing this project as I get better at game development, using it as some kind of milestone representation in my journey.

I hope you enjoy what is available and please give me any feedback or possible ideas. They'd be much appreciated.  :)

P.S. you can press esc to exit the game and holding shift provides a minor speed boost
